sentences.en: a beautiful necklace, plated with 22-carat gold
sentences.cn: 一条漂亮的22开镀金项链

sentences.en: a dinner plate
sentences.cn: 餐碟

sentences.en: Anita pushed her plate away; she had eaten virtually nothing.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔把自己的盘子推开；她几乎什么都没吃。

sentences.en: copper printing plates
sentences.cn: 铜印版

sentences.en: Even the presidency was handed to him on a plate.
sentences.cn: 他甚至连总统之位都是得来全不费工夫。

sentences.en: Garnish the plate with whipped cream rosettes and fresh fruits.
sentences.cn: 用玫瑰花形的掼奶油和新鲜的水果作配菜点缀盘子。

sentences.en: He drove a Rolls-Royce with a personalised number plate.
sentences.cn: 他开一辆个性车牌的劳斯莱斯。

sentences.en: Mr. Dambar had loaded his plate with stuffed flounder.
sentences.cn: 但拔先生的餐盘里盛满了填馅的比目鱼。

sentences.en: My waitress whipped the plate away and put down my bill.
sentences.cn: 我的服务员麻利地撤走盘子并搁下我的账单。

sentences.en: On the table beside an empty plate was a pile of books.
sentences.cn: 桌上空盘子的旁边是一堆书。

sentences.en: Remove the wafers with a spoon and transfer them to a plate.
sentences.cn: 用勺子抄起薄饼，把它们转盛到盘子里。

sentences.en: She laid down her knife and fork and pushed her plate away.
sentences.cn: 她放下刀叉，推开盘子。

sentences.en: The brass plate on the door said ‘Dr Rackman’.
sentences.cn: 黄铜门牌上写着“雷克曼博士”。

sentences.en: The plate broke.
sentences.cn: 盘子打破了。

sentences.en: The plates were piled high with rice.
sentences.cn: 盘子里都堆满了米饭。

sentences.en: The waitress whipped the plate away and put down my bill.
sentences.cn: 服务员把盘子撤走，放下了我的账单。

sentences.en: The work interposes a glass plate between two large circular mirrors.
sentences.cn: 该艺术品在两面圆形大镜子中间插入一块玻璃板。

sentences.en: They are available in polished brass, antique brass or silver-plate.
sentences.cn: 它们有哑铜的，古铜的和镀银的。

sentences.en: This horse won the Galway Plate.
sentences.cn: 这匹马在戈尔韦银碟赛中获胜了。

sentences.en: Two cables connect to each corner of the plate.
sentences.cn: 两条电缆连到金属板的每个角上。

sentences.en: Visitors see the painting from behind a plate glass window.
sentences.cn: 参观者隔着平板玻璃橱窗欣赏那幅画。

sentences.en: you've &B{got a lot on your plate} at the moment.
sentences.cn: 眼下，你需要分心的事很多。

words.tran_cn: 铁甲工；镀金匠；金属版工

phrases.tran_cn: n. 电热板；轻便电炉；餐厅出售的热食
(主英)分心，占用时间，占用精力
板式换热器；膜片式热交换器
板块厚度；筛板厚度；金属板厚度
薄板；极薄的金属板混响；薄钢板

trans.tran_cn: 盘子，盆子，金属板，均匀厚度的片状硬物体，[摄]底片，感光版
trans.tran_en: a flat piece of metal with words or numbers on it, for example on a door or a car
a flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver

trans.tran_cn: 镀，在…上覆盖金属板，覆盖，电镀，[印]给…制铅板
trans.tran_en: to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver
